resources.string: During the game, you need to find hidden treasures represented by QR codes. They will look like the one shown below:
To discover the secrets behind the QR code, you need to scan it by pressing:

The game will help us by telling how many steps in a straight line are left to the treasure and whether to go north, south, east, or west. But you have to find the directions by yourself. Donâ€™t worry because you can find hints under these buttons:
There are several treasures to find. You can change the one you are currently searching for by pressing this button:
